attributes.action: allow the Madeline McCann fund to receive charitable status
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The fund has been refused charitable status because it is deemed to only benefit one individual rather than the community as a whole. I think that finding the perpetrators of this crime will benefit the whole community and it is therefore a bona fide charity.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
